product_name: Sierra Designs Backcountry Bed Duo 600 2-Season Sleeping Bag
long_description: Sleep in the backcountry as you do at home. This lofty down sleeping bag uses an integrated comforter and no zippers for a true bedlike experience while camping during spring and summer.
short_description: Sleep in the backcountry as you do at home. This lofty down sleeping bag uses an integrated comforter and no zippers for a true bedlike experience while camping during spring and summer.
